q2: Will they ever go far in the world cup
a2: Probably not. They play well but there are much stronger teams.
q3: How about in the Euro championships?
a3: Switzerland's best result was the round of 16 in 2016
q4: Do you think Shaqiri did well in this cup?
a4: Honestly, even getting to the World Cup showed that they are playing well.
q5: Which group are they playing in the Euro Championship?
a5: In 2019 probably the same as this season.
